queryName: Beta - Nifcloud LB use insecure TLS policy name
descriptionText: The `lb` uses an insecure TLS policy. The `nifcloud_load_balancer` resource either omits the `ssl_policy_name` attribute or sets it to an outdated SSL policy. Configure `ssl_policy_name` to use a modern TLS policy (TLS v1.2 or newer) and avoid legacy SSL policies.
